page.title: 04Housing in E.Calder 1985
page.content: {Council xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx } {Wimpey xxxxxxxxxxxx {Leech xxxxxxxx} {Bellway xxxxxxxx {Mansfd. xxxxxxxxx {Lindo x x=25 houses Many new people come to live in East Calder every year. They come because they can travel to their work easily in nearby Livingston or Edinburgh. People also come to East Calder because the houses are cheaper than in Edinburgh-Â£44,000 for a three bedroomed detached house. Leech,Wimpey and Bellway all built on farmer's land.The builders built on 36% of Langton Farm in 1978.Now the farmer sometimes has vandalism from the local people.He has had a fire in one of his barns in which he lost hay, a combine harvester and tractor. by Erik and Scott.
